atk-s0403a39:0_0: The sub-chapter on money is finished.
atk-s0403a39:1_0: And he too lived on the first, and the beautiful ones.

atk-s0403a39:2_5: A mendicant who has ended the defilements has claimed to be fully extinguished upon landing, based on the liberation of the mind, but their mind isn’t found.
